entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Thursday 20 April 2023
